item.title: Feature Engineering with Stepwise Regression
item.description: When I was studying statistics, I noticed an algorithm called “stepwise regression”. Generally, this is a method that ranks features based on their importances and finds out how important each feature is to the prediction. The following coding will show the process of finding the features importances.
